data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Melanie: That was the best movie I've seen in years.
Jake: Are ____ kidding? I ____ that ____ was ____ dull ____ predictable. If I thought ____ wouldn't ____ anyone ____ the ____, I would've ____ on ____ phone ____ whole ____.
Melanie: I can't believe ____ were ____ the ____ film! But you and I never agree about entertainment.
data.partBlankContent:
Melanie: That was the best movie I've seen in years.
Jake: Are y__ kidding? I tho____ that i_ was s_ dull a__ predictable. If I thought i_ wouldn't bot___ anyone i_ the the____, I would've be__ on m_ phone t__ whole ti__.
Melanie: I can't believe w_ were watc____ the sa__ film! But you and I never agree about entertainment.
data.fullContent: Melanie: That was the best movie I've seen in years. Jake: Are you kidding? I thought that it was so dull and predictable. If I thought it wouldn't bother anyone in the theater, I would've been on my phone the whole time. Melanie: I can't believe we were watching the same film! But you and I never agree about entertainment.
data.answer: 梅勒妮：那是我多年来看过的最好的电影。 杰克：你在开玩笑吗？我认为它是如此枯燥和可预测的。如果我认为这不会影响到剧院里的任何人，我就会一直打电话。 梅勒妮：真不敢相信我们居然在看同一部电影！但是你和我从来没有在娱乐方面达成一致。
